message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm trying to be a savvy buyer and make the most of my budget.

Bob,  I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $9000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10500, which is still a great price considering the value you'll get. Let's meet in the middle!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $10000. Can you consider that?
